forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Areas Of Drizzle then Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of drizzle and areas of fog and a chance of rain before 10am, then rain and areas of drizzle and areas of fog. Cloudy, with a high near 50. Southwest wind around 13 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers between 11pm and 3am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 22. West wind 14 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 37 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
In Boston, a muted morning unfolds, draped in whispers of fog and drizzle. The air feels heavy with a chill, as the temperatures hover around the low fifties, shushing the usual morning bustle of the city. Today, the sky is a blanket of gray, promising rain that will tease its way through until the shadows of the day retreat. With a southwest wind carrying a hint of dampness, the elements come together to cloak the day in an ambiance that feels both melancholic and timeless. As the sun struggles to break through the veil, any likelihood of a clear horizon fades, replaced with the soft contours of a fog-infused vista.

As night drapes its dark cloak over the city, the temperatures will dive to the low twenties, ushering in a brief flirtation with snow showers, though they might come as fleeting text messages from winter rather than a full-blown conversation. For those braving the outdoors, layered clothing will be your ally—perhaps a woolen scarf and a weatherproof jacket to fend off the chill and embrace the dampness. Strolling through the dampened streets or finding solace in a cozy café with a steaming cup of coffee may well be the perfect remedy to offset this slightly oppressive day. A visit to a gallery showcasing local art might be a lovely way to spend the afternoon, allowing the mind to wander free while the world outside plays a drizzly melody.
